commit.message:
Merging from 0_6_X + updating to Tomcat 7.0.19

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1247043 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -15,10 +15,6 @@
     <packaging>war</packaging>
 
     <properties>
-        <hsqldb.version>2.0.0</hsqldb.version>
-        <connid.soap.version>1.0</connid.soap.version>
-        <connid.db.table.version>1.1</connid.db.table.version>
-
         <logfile>/var/tmp/syncope-console.log</logfile>
         <logfile.test>/var/tmp/syncope-console-test.log</logfile.test>
 
@@ -89,12 +85,19 @@
                     <mode>server</mode>
                     <isTransient>true</isTransient>
                 </configuration>
+                <dependencies>
+                    <dependency>
+                        <groupId>org.hsqldb</groupId>
+                        <artifactId>hsqldb</artifactId>
+                        <version>${hsqldb.version}</version>
+                    </dependency>
+                </dependencies>
                 <executions>
                     <execution>
                         <id>startTestDb</id>
                         <phase>package</phase>
                         <goals>
-                            <goal>run</goal>    
+                            <goal>run</goal>
                         </goals>
                     </execution>
                 </executions>
@@ -119,23 +122,22 @@
                     <sqlCommand>
 			ALTER USER sa SET PASSWORD "sa";
 
-			DROP TABLE test IF EXISTS;
-			CREATE TABLE test (
-			id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
-			password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
-			UNIQUE(id));
+                        DROP TABLE test IF EXISTS;
+                        CREATE TABLE test (
+                        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
+                        password VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL);
 
-			INSERT INTO test VALUES (1, 'password');
+                        INSERT INTO test VALUES (1, 'password');
                     </sqlCommand>
                 </configuration>
                 <executions>
                     <execution>
                         <id>loadTestDb</id>
                         <phase>package</phase>
                         <goals>
-                            <goal>execute</goal>    
+                            <goal>execute</goal>
                         </goals>
-                    </execution>    
+                    </execution>
                 </executions>
             </plugin>
